src:
Ratusan RW Masih Kumuh, Pemprov DKI Siap Lakukan Penataan
06 Nov 2019, 12:26 by Rayinda Muhammad Ichwan


Ratusan RW Masih Kumuh, Pemprov DKI Siap Lakukan Penataan

KBRN, Jakarta: Ratusan RW di Jakarta dilaporkan masih dalam keadaan kumuh. Untuk itu Pemprov DKI memastikan akan melakukan penataan secara terstruktur.
Kepala Suku Dinas Perumahan Rakyat dan Kawasan Permukiman Jakarta Barat Suharyanti mengatakan, penataan akan dilakukan dengan konsep community action plan (CAP) dan penataan tanpa CAP.
Ia mengatakan, berdasarkan data Badan Pusat Statistik (BPS) 2017, ada 445 RW kumuh di Jakarta. Dari jumlah tersebut, 200 RW akan ditata dengan konsep CAP.“Penataan 200 RW kumuh dilakukan dengan konsep CAP itu tercantum dalam Peraturan Daerah Nomor 1 Tahun 2018 tentang RPJMD (Rencana Pembangunan Jangka Menengah Daerah) dan termasuk rencana strategis Pemprov DKI,” kata Suharyanti, Rabu (6/10/2019).Adapun 200 RW yang kumuh itu diketahui berdasarkan data BPS tahun 2013. Namun, saat ini sudah menjadi 445 RW setelah Pemprov DKI membuat renstra.”Kawasan kumuh yang ditata menggunakan konsep CAP hanya 200 RW. 245 RW kumuh lainnya ditata tanpa CAP. Ini berdasarkan usulan warga saat musyawarah rencana pembangunan,” pungkasnya.
text:
Hundreds of RW Are Still Slums, DKI Provincial Government Is Ready to Arrange
Nov 6, 2019, 12:26 by Rayinda Muhammad Ichwan


Hundreds of RW Are Still Slums, DKI Provincial Government Is Ready to Arrange

KBRN, Jakarta: Hundreds of RWs in Jakarta are reportedly still in slums. For this reason, the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government will ensure structured structuring.
Head of West Jakarta Public Housing and Settlement Area Chief Suharyanti said that the arrangement would be carried out with the concept of a community action plan (CAP) and an arrangement without CAP.
He said, based on 2017 Central Statistics Agency (BPS) data, there were 445 slum RWs in Jakarta. Of these, 200 RW will be arranged with the CAP concept. "The structuring of 200 slum RWs carried out with the CAP concept is listed in Regional Regulation No. 1 of 2018 concerning RPJMD (Regional Medium-Term Development Plan) and includes the strategic plan of the DKI Provincial Government," Suharyanti said, Wednesday (10/6/2019). As for the 200 slum RWs it was known based on 2013 BPS data. However, now there are 445 RWs after the DKI Provincial Government has made a strategic plan. ”Slum areas that are arranged using the CAP concept are only 200 RWs. The other 245 slum RWs were laid out without a CAP. This is based on the people's suggestion during the development planning meeting, "he concluded.
